::Grimlock::
   
  Grimlock watches as Perseus' party approches the Airtankers air-ship form.
   
  Grimlock: Party coming! Need few more then we go!

Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:
          OOC: Oh, right!  I forgot about that!  Ravenchief can fly (and so can Talon if she's coming).  Perseus and Guardia will need a ride :P

BIC:

Lord Perseus gathered at the front gate with Guardia and Ravenchief.   (Perseus didn't ask him to come, but he never passes up an opportunity for action).  Perseus waited for anyone else who might be coming, then they exited as a group and walked to the shuttle port.

  On Wed, Feb 20, 2008 at 10:23 PM, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
            
  ::Lord Elder::
   
  Elder: Splendid. Let's do that. I believe everyone is just about here.
   
  OOC: Are the Airtankers in their aircraft mode? Also, who is there currently? It alwats gets confusing to me with so many chars on one thing.  

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:

        Airtank: As a matter of fact, we prefer flying on our own. By the way,
why take a shuttle when we can carry everyone?

> ::Grimlock::
> 
> Grimlock is standing by on the rescue party shuttle. He waits for
Doc and Windlord and Perseus and whoever joins.
> 
> From the shuttle Grimlock opens a comm to the Airtankers.
> 
> Grimlock: Airtankers no like me Grimlock's flying?





  
  
---------------------------------
